name: Hospital Adventure - Doctor Salon & Kids Games
name_original: Hospital Adventure - Doctor Salon & Kids Games
description:
***Over 850,000 Downloads!*** Come play doctor with the cute teddy bear and pets in this fun adventure game! Help clean-up, do make up, play with the unicorn and much more!

Level 1: Play & care for the baby pet unicorn!! Add unicorn horn & toy, give milk bottle, eat candy and use the stethoscope to take a rainbow heart beat!

Level 2: Help clean up the messy doctor and wash hair! Use shampoo to wash green slime out of hair. Then rinse off with the water sprayer and add hats & gloves!!

Level 3: Play with the rainbow teddy bear toy!! Clean-up and put on a cute play doctor outfit!!

Level 4: Give a new makeover. Comb rainbow hair with the brush, add make-up, earrings, necklace and more!

Level 5: Oh no! The pet puppy is messy! Help do puppy care and clean-up! What a cute new puppy! Bark! It's time to change diapers, brush hair, feed the treats & milk, put on collar and play with the ball!

*Level 6: Let's care for Mommy! Feed mommy cookies & ice-cream. Apply make-up, comb messy hair and more!

*Level 7: The pink fashion princess needs help with a new makeover! Add jewelry, magical tiara and wand! Apply make-up and fix the pink hair style!

*Level 8: Baby care and play room - change the baby diapers, feed the baby, comb hair and play with a baby toy!

*Level 9: Help the family with a fashion emergency! Shave the beard, brush hair and clean-up the messy characters! Add a flying unicorn and teddy bear!

*Please note that levels 6-9 must be purchased separately.
*Please note that Play Toy & Pet Doctor is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items and remove ads with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.*

Kids Games Studio is very concerned about our users' privacy. To understand our policies and obligations, please read our Terms Of Service and Privacy Policy carefully.

Privacy Policy: http://www.kidsgamesstudio.com/privacy
